translations: v．（马）生产，产仔：指母马生下小马。
· The mare foaled a healthy colt.
这匹母马生下了一匹健康的小马驹。

sentences.sentence: One of the farmers owned a mare that had foaled in the marketplace.
sentences.translation: 其中一个农夫拥有的一匹母马，在市场诞下了小马。

sentences.sentence: All the time, our overfraught hearts are beating at a rate that would far outstrip the fastest gallop of the fastest horses ever foaled.
sentences.translation: 在这整个儿的时间里，我们那负担过重的心都在狂跳，跳得比世界上最快的马的最迅猛的奔跑还要快。

sentences.sentence: This mare had recently foaled , we had no time to grieve as we had to immediately turn our attention to her young baby whose first need was to eat.
sentences.translation: 这匹母马刚产仔，我们没有时间为丧失母马而悲痛，因为我们必须立即照顾好新生的小马驹，它的第一需要是喂食。
